info.name: Dark Unity Answers
info.description: Basic Brightness reduction of the Unity Answers site.
info.additionalInfo:
21-02-2014 Fixed code background for formatted code in comments not being dark
18-02-2014 Added custom styling for code. Not all syntax types are recognized yet. Please message me an example page if you notice usage of bright pink syntax (unknown syntax is pink: atn, atv,  dec, var, fun.)
